Ctrl: Absolute Position, Alt: Percentage of Screen
tips.sakura_sign_in.how_to_sign_in: Left-click to sign in, Right-click to make up sign-in / claim rewards

Sign-In Cards: %s
Consecutive Sign-ins: %sd
Total Sign-ins: %sd
tips.sakura_sign_in.sign_in_screen_tips:
Instructions:
1. Left-click to sign in (only for today)
2. Right-click to make up sign-ins and claim rewards
3. Left and right-clicking the theme selector will yield different effects
4. You can use the keyboard arrow keys '↑', '→', '↓', '←' to flip through the calendar
5. Hold the 'Shift' key and hover the mouse over different buttons to see various tooltips
6. Nyaa!
tips.sakura_sign_in.reward_option_screen:
Friendly Reminder:
1. While playing on the server, after modifying the configuration,
  click the 'Sync configuration to server' button in the right sidebar
2. When entering the server, your local configuration file will be
  overridden by the server's configuration
3. To 'Delete' or 'Clear' reward configurations, hold the 'Ctrl' key
  and right-click to confirm (a bit tedious, right?)
4. For more information, use the '?' button at the top right
tips.sakura_sign_in.reward_rule_descript: Base Sign-In Reward: Awarded on every sign-in.

Continuous Sign-In Reward: After signing in consecutively for a certain
    number of days, you will receive corresponding rewards.
    If your sign-in days fall short of the next reward threshold
    but meet the previous one, you will receive the previous reward.
    (Requires modification of the server configuration
    option continuousRewardsRepeatable)
    Default config: Sign in on days 1, 2, and 3 to earn 5 XP;
    sign in on days 4, 5, 6, and 7 to receive 1 cake;
    After day 8, you will receive 1 make-up sign-in card.

Sign-In Cycle Reward: After consecutive sign-ins for a certain number of days,
    you will receive corresponding rewards.
    If the number of consecutive sign-in days exceeds the maximum,
    the cycle will reset to the first reward.
    (Requires modification of the server configuration
     option cycleRewardsRepeatable)
    Default config: Sign in on days 2, 3, 4, 7, 8, and 9 to earn 3 XP;
    Sign in on days 5 and 10 to receive 1 experience level.
Annual Sign-In Reward: On the xth day of the year, you will receive a reward.
Monthly Sign-In Reward: On the xth day of the month, you will receive a reward.

Weekly Sign-In Reward: On the xth day of the week (e.g., Sunday), you will
    receive a reward.
    Default config: Signing in on Saturday gives you 100 minutes
    of Luck I effect;
    Signing in on Sunday gives you 100 minutes of Regeneration I,
    100 minutes of Jump Boost I, and 1 enchanted golden apple.

Specific Time Reward: Rewards are given for signing in on specified dates
    or date ranges.
    Sign in on these dates/ranges to receive corresponding rewards.
    Default config:
    Sign in from October 6th to October 7th every year to receive
    1 experience bottle and 5 minutes of Resistance II.
    Date formats supported include:
    yyyy-MM-dd, 0000-MM-dd, yyyy-MM-00, 0000-MM-00,
    yyyy~n-MM~n-dd, 0000-MM~n-dd~n, yyyy-MM~n-00,
    0000-MM~n-00, yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm, yyyy-MM-ddTHH~n:mm~n.
    When specifying specific times, date and time should be
    separated by 'T'; ~n denotes a range,
    e.g., 2024-10-05~5 means from October 5th to 10th of 2024;
    0000 (yyyy) means no specific year, 00 (MM) means no specific month,
    and 00 (dd) means no specific day.

Cumulative Sign-In Reward: Earn rewards when reaching a certain number of
    cumulative sign-ins.

Random Reward Pool: A random reward from a pool of possible rewards will be
    granted on each sign-in.

Redemption Code Reward Pool: Enter a redemption code to claim rewards;
    each code can only be used once.
